Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it's Mr. {Farmer_Name}, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it's Mr. , the new er! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it's Ms. {Farmer_Name}, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it's Ms. , the new er! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.

Entries.DialogueText: If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!

Entries.DialogueText: A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!

Entries.DialogueText: How can I possibly compete with Joja? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How can I possibly come with Joja?

Entries.DialogueText: Their pockets are so deep, they can just sell at a loss until little guys like me are out of business... then they'll jack up their prices! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Their pockets are so deep, they can just sell at a loss until little guys like me are out of business... then they'll jack up their prices!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, I can't believe you'd give this to me. It must've cost you a fortune! Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, I can't believe you'd give this to me. It must've cost you a fortune! Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Gripping! Fascinating! It's the perfect book for me! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gripping! Fascinating! It's the perfect for me!

Entries.DialogueText: Gahh, no customers! Any more of this 'green' rain, and my ledger will be in the 'red'! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gahh, no customers! Any more of this 'green' rain, and my ledger will be in the 'red'!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'm glad things are back to normal. Seems like it was all overblown... just like everything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'm glad things are back to normal. Seems like it was all overblown... just like everything.

Entries.DialogueText: Glad to see you, {Farmer_Name}. What's a little toxic rain when you have seeds to buy? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Glad to see you, . What's a little toxic rain when you have seeds to buy?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just kidding. The rain seems to be completely harmless.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just kidding. The rain seems to be completely harmless.

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail's going through a rebellious phase... I get it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail's going through a rebellious phase... I get it.

Entries.DialogueText: She'll wise up when she has to make her first mortgage payment! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: She'll wise up when she has to make her first mortgage payment!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm determined to keep my shop running until the bitter end. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm determined to keep my shop running until the bitter end.

Entries.DialogueText: Morris and his cronies will have to drag me out from behind the counter, kicking and screaming! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Morris and his cronies will have to drag me out from behind the counter, kicking and screaming!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm losing a lot of money being away from the shop... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm losing a lot of money being away from the shop...

Entries.DialogueText: But, you know what? It's worth it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, you know what? It's worth it.

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... that salty smell of the sea is making me want some sashimi.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... that salty smell of the sea is making me want some sashimi.

Entries.DialogueText: Eh, let the kids play in the sun. I'll just sit in this chair.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eh, let the kids play in the sun. I'll just sit in this chair.

Entries.DialogueText: Drink after drink... Gus must be making a killing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Drink after drink... Gus must be making a killing!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, now that you have dual incomes, I expect you'll be purchasing twice as many seeds, right? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, now that you have dual incomes, I expect you'll be purchasing twice as many seeds, right?

Entries.DialogueText: Haha... I'm only joking.... *ahem*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha... I'm only joking.... *ahem*...

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, er... my son? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er... my son?

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, er... daughter? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er... daughter?

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.

Entries.DialogueText: For a small town like this, one store is enough! There's too much social pressure for me to overcharge, anyway.
Entries.DisplayPattern: For a small town like this, one store is enough! There's too much social pressure for me to overcharge, anyway.

Entries.DialogueText: This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, that's a great idea... It'll be nice to get out from behind the counter. I'll meet you there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, that's a great idea... It'll be nice to get out from behind the counter. I'll meet you there!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome! If you're looking for seeds, you've come to the right place!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome! If you're looking for seeds, you've come to the right !

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, er... my son? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er... my son?

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, er... daughter? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er... daughter?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Need any seeds or fruit tree saplings?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Need any seeds or fruit tree saplings?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. How's Abigail doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . How's Abigail doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I get new items in stock, so make sure to stop by every so often.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes I get new items in stock, so make sure to stop by every so often.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a lot of work to run a shop. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a lot of work to run a shop.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I used to be a pretty good boxer back in the day... my right hook was the stuff of legend! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I used to be a pretty good boxer back in the day... my right hook was the stuff of legend!

Entries.DialogueText: It's my day off today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's my day off today.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... what to do... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... what to do...

Entries.DialogueText: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierre1
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierre1

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just bored with domestic life. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just bored with domestic life.

Entries.DialogueText: When I was younger I always had something interesting to do... now I find myself just wasting time whenever I'm not at work. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: When I was younger I always had something interesting to do... now I find myself just wasting whenever I'm not at work.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy to buy any produce off you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy to buy any produce off you.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll give you a fair price, of course!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll give you a fair price, of course!

Entries.DialogueText: I really do appreciate your business, Mr. {Farmer_Name}. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really do appreciate your business, Mr. . I've been having a harder and harder turning a decent profit.

Entries.DialogueText: I really do appreciate your business, Ms. {Farmer_Name}. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really do appreciate your business, Ms. . I've been having a harder and harder turning a decent profit.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierre2
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierre2

Entries.DialogueText: Does Abigail look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Does Abigail look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but somes I wonder if I'm really the father.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierreJoja
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierreJoja

Entries.DialogueText: Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to compete with their selection.$k {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to come with their selection.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there. Is your farm doing well?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there. Is your doing well?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.

Entries.DialogueText: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll tell you a secret. Sometimes, when the store is empty, I'll practice my opera singing behind the counter. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll tell you a secret. Somes, when the store is empty, I'll practice my opera singing behind the counter.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell anyone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierreBlue
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierreBlue

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...$k {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I could go for a walk, but I can't leave the store unattended.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I could go for a walk, but I can't leave the store unattended.

Entries.DialogueText: I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great...

Entries.DialogueText: Some day I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some day I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.

Entries.DialogueText: Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money...

Entries.DialogueText: Business has been pretty good since JojaMart closed down.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Business has been pretty good since JojaMart closed down.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. You're my number one customer!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . You're my number one customer!

Entries.DialogueText: I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so glad to have a day off from work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so glad to have a day off from work.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!

Entries.DialogueText: Running the shop is one of the most important things in my life, but sometimes you just need a day off...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Running the shop is one of the most important things in my life, but somes you just need a day off...

Entries.DialogueText: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!

Entries.DialogueText: Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi. Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi. Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?

Entries.DialogueText: Summer is a good time to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer is a good to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh... It's so hot in here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh... It's so hot in here.

Entries.DialogueText: You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.

Entries.DialogueText: It's really going to cut into our profits.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's really going to cut into our profits.

Entries.DialogueText: Finally... a day of relaxation.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Finally... a day of relaxation.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierreDin
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierreDin

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to surprise Caroline tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to surprise Caroline tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. In the mood for a little shopping?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. In the mood for a little shopping?

Entries.DialogueText: I mainly deal in edibles, so if you've got any ores or wood you'd better try selling them somewhere else.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I mainly deal in edibles, so if you've got any ores or wood you'd better try selling them somewhere else.

Entries.DialogueText: Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?

Entries.DialogueText: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now.

Entries.DialogueText: It would be fun to throw a snowball.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It would be fun to throw a snowball.

Entries.DialogueText: Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.

Entries.DialogueText: Better go all out, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Better go all out, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: It's starting to get cold outside...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's starting to get cold outside...

Entries.DialogueText: That means more people come into the shop to warm up... Hehe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That means more people come into the shop to warm up... Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} pierreMEGA
Entries.DisplayPattern: # pierreMEGA

Entries.DialogueText: My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. Hehehe.$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. Hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there. Is your still doing well?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the .

Entries.DialogueText: Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't get any ideas...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't get any ideas...

Entries.DialogueText: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now...
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now...

Entries.DialogueText: The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: ...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!

Entries.DialogueText: You would really do that to me? You're terrible. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You would really do that to me? You're terrible.

Entries.DialogueText: You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbors are the worst. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first ! Nosy neighbors are the worst.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, good luck.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, good luck.

Entries.DialogueText: It feels great to be on top! Hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It feels great to be on top! Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Nice effort, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nice effort, though.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe I lost... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe I lost...

Entries.DialogueText: Most people stay indoors on days like this... It's not good for business. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most people stay indoors on days like this... It's not good for business.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello there, {Farmer_Name}. So! Your first year in Stardew Valley is almost over, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello there, . So! Your first year in Stardew Valley is almost over, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: If you keep buying seeds from me, you'll be twice as productive next year! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you keep buying seeds from me, you'll be twice as productive next year!

Entries.DialogueText: And I have some exciting news...
Entries.DisplayPattern: And I have some exciting news...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be selling new seed varieties in my shop next year! I should have 1 new variety per season.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be selling new seed varieties in my shop next year! I should have 1 new variety per .

Entries.DialogueText: ...Well, that's all I wanted to say. Have a good one.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Well, that's all I wanted to say. Have a good one.

Entries.DialogueText: You know... I wouldn't even bother trying my competitor's seeds. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know... I wouldn't even bother trying my comitor's seeds.

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre's seeds are the *highest* quality seeds you'll find anywhere. That's a promise. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre's seeds are the *highest* quality seeds you'll find anywhere. That's a promise.

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail?! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail?!

Entries.DialogueText: I've been looking all over for you! Your mother wants you to come home and help with dinner! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been looking all over for you! Your mother wants you to come home and help with dinner!

Entries.DialogueText: What are you doing in the graveyard, anyway? This is no place for a young lady! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What are you doing in the graveyard, anyway? This is no for a young lady!

Entries.DialogueText: Come back!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come back!

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, my dad won't find us here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, my dad won't find us here...

Entries.DialogueText: How does it feel?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How does it feel?

Entries.DialogueText: Let's be reasonable.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's be reasonable.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's settle this the old-fashioned way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's settle this the old-fashioned way.

Entries.DialogueText: No...not this time... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No...not this ...

Entries.DialogueText: Gather 'round, everyone!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gather 'round, everyone!

Entries.DialogueText: I remember when I first moved to Pelican Town... This building was active and vibrant.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember when I first moved to Pelican Town... This building was active and vibrant.

Entries.DialogueText: We worked together to make the town a better place. There was a real sense of community.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We worked together to make the town a better . There was a real sense of community.

Entries.DialogueText: George, you always used to do the crossword puzzle while sipping coffee in the community kitchen. Remember?
Entries.DisplayPattern: George, you always used to do the crossword puzzle while sipping coffee in the community kitchen. Remember?

Entries.DialogueText: Emily, you wove that custom banner for the Stardew Valley Fair.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Emily, you wove that custom banner for the Stardew Valley Fair.

Entries.DialogueText: I remember you working on that for years! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember you working on that for years!

Entries.DialogueText: Willy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy!

Entries.DialogueText: Remember when your little crab experiment got out of hand? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember when your little crab experiment got out of hand?

Entries.DialogueText: But Gus saved the day with a brilliant idea... A crab leg feast for the entire valley!
Entries.DisplayPattern: But Gus saved the day with a brilliant idea... A crab leg feast for the entire valley!

Entries.DialogueText: You see, everyone? Our community is what makes Pelican Town special.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see, everyone? Our community is what makes Pelican Town special.

Entries.DialogueText: When JojaMart came to town we lost sight of that. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: When JojaMart came to town we lost sight of that.

Entries.DialogueText: But now, thanks to {Farmer_Name}, we have a second chance.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But now, thanks to , we have a second chance.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm asking that you join me in boycotting JojaMart! We have the power to reclaim our old way of life!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm asking that you join me in boycotting JojaMart! We have the power to reclaim our old way of life!

Entries.DialogueText: Who's with me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Who's with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! Who's in the bedroom? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! Who's in the bedroom?

Entries.DialogueText: Wha...? How did you find that?! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wha...? How did you find that?!

Entries.DialogueText: Quick, give it to me! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Quick, give it to me!

Entries.DialogueText: Promise me you won't tell anyone about this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Promise me you won't tell anyone about this.

Entries.DialogueText: Your secret is safe with me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your secret is safe with me.

Entries.DialogueText: Your wife deserves to know about this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your wife deserves to know about this.

Entries.DialogueText: *grumble*...now I have to find a new hiding spot...*grumble* {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *grumble*...now I have to find a new hiding spot...*grumble*

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome To Pierre's! How can I help you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome To Pierre's! How can I help you?

Entries.DialogueText: Percent!?!?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Percent!?!?

Entries.DialogueText: But... I can't match those prices! I'd be selling at a loss! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... I can't match those prices! I'd be selling at a loss!

Entries.DialogueText: Gus, I have just the thing for you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gus, I have just the thing for you...

Entries.DialogueText: It's a bundle of locally sourced, organic, heirloom veggies...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a bundle of locally sourced, organic, heirloom veggies...

Entries.DialogueText: These are hand picked and sorted, to ensure only the very finest in quality and taste.
Entries.DisplayPattern: These are hand picked and sorted, to ensure only the very finest in quality and taste.

Entries.DialogueText: This is a once-in-a-lifetime kind of offer!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a once-in-a-life kind of offer!

Entries.DialogueText: ONLY... *mumble* mumble*
Entries.DisplayPattern: ONLY... *mumble* mumble*

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... that's right. It really is a bargain, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... that's right. It really is a bargain, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Wait! How about 10,000g then!? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait! How about 10,000g then!?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a disaster, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a disaster, ...

Entries.DialogueText: I thought this was a surefire business strategy. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought this was a surefire business strategy.

Entries.DialogueText: But it turns out, no one is willing to buy vegetables at a 10x price markup, even if I put the little 'organic' sticker on them. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But it turns out, no one is willing to buy vegetables at a 10x price markup, even if I put the little 'organic' sticker on them.

Entries.DialogueText: You're right, you can't run a business without taking some risk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're right, you can't run a business without taking some risk.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I'm not forcing anyone to buy it! If they don't like the price, they can move on. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I'm not forcing anyone to buy it! If they don't like the price, they can move on.

Entries.DialogueText: ...But, I guess you have a point. If I make all my customers angry, then pretty soon I won't have any customers at all... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But, I guess you have a point. If I make all my customers angry, then pretty soon I won't have any customers at all...

Entries.DialogueText: By the way, {Farmer_Name}... you look like you could really use a veggie dinner tonight.
Entries.DisplayPattern: By the way, ... you look like you could really use a veggie dinner tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: What do you say, wanna buy these back for the low, low price of 2,501g?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you say, wanna buy these back for the low, low price of 2,501g?

Entries.DialogueText: No... Not this time, Morris. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No... Not this , Morris.

Entries.DialogueText: I think it's time we settled this once and for all. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think it's we settled this once and for all.

Entries.DialogueText: If you're too scared to fight me then bring one of your co-workers! Or are all Joja employees such cowards? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you're too scared to fight me then bring one of your co-workers! Or are all Joja employees such cowards?

Entries.DialogueText: And the way you throw punches is just like Joja... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And the way you throw punches is just like Joja...

Entries.DialogueText: Quantity over quality!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Quantity over quality!

Entries.DialogueText: My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!
Entries.DisplayPattern: My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm confident that I'll emerge victorious in this year's grange display competition! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm confident that I'll emerge victorious in this year's grange display comition!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, it's farmer {Farmer_Name}! I have quite the selection of wares tonight. Take a look! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, it's er ! I have quite the selection of wares tonight. Take a look!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! How'd you get back here? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! How'd you get back here?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't touch anything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't touch anything.

Entries.DialogueText: Trying to make a back-room deal, huh? Hah! I admire your gumption.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Trying to make a back-room deal, huh? Hah! I admire your gumption.

Entries.DialogueText: What! How'd you get back here? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What! How'd you get back here?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't touch anything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't touch anything.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you shouldn't be back here! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you shouldn't be back here!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, if you're sticking around... mind manning the booth for a while? I want to taste Linus' sweet and tangy jelly.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, if you're sticking around... mind manning the booth for a while? I want to taste Linus' sweet and tangy jelly.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm joking, I can't bear to be away from the register... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm joking, I can't bear to be away from the register...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?

Entries.DialogueText: Now if only the Mayor would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now if only the Mayor would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.

Entries.DialogueText: The moment Lewis steps away from the governor... that's my moment to rub elbows... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The moment Lewis steps away from the governor... that's my moment to rub elbows...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, I didn't see you there. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, I didn't see you there.

Entries.DialogueText: If you want to buy something, talk to me on the other side of the counter. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you want to buy something, talk to me on the other side of the counter.

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... Make sure to swing by the shop tomorrow to get your fall seeds!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... Make sure to swing by the shop tomorrow to get your fall seeds!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, farmer {Farmer_Name}. Be sure to drop by my store tomorrow to purchase your fall seeds! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er . Be sure to drop by my store tomorrow to purchase your fall seeds!

Entries.DialogueText: My sales figures have been phenomenal lately... thanks to the Feast of the Winter Star! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My sales figures have been phenomenal lately... thanks to the Feast of the Winter Star!

Entries.DialogueText: Boy, holidays are good for business. I wonder if I could invent some new ones...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Boy, holidays are good for business. I wonder if I could invent some new ones...

Entries.DialogueText: Need any last minute gifts? I've got you covered! Take a look at my wares. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Need any last minute gifts? I've got you covered! Take a look at my wares.

Entries.DialogueText: This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: Our family has matching Winter Star sweaters.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our family has matching Winter Star sweaters.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, if only Abigail would wear hers... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, if only Abigail would wear hers...

Entries.DialogueText: This is my all-time favorite! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is my all- ! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: That's very kind of you. I like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's very kind of you. I like this.

Entries.DialogueText: This isn't exactly my favorite...
Entries.DisplayPattern: This isn't exactly my ...

Entries.DialogueText: Please, never bring this to me again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please, never bring this to me again.

Entries.DialogueText: A present? Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: A present? Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't say it was a hit... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't say it was a hit...

Entries.DialogueText: ... well,... back to business, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... well,... back to business, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: My wife loved it! ...And Abby even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My wife loved it! ...And Abby even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce.

Entries.DialogueText: ... well,... back to business, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... well,... back to business, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...

Entries.DialogueText: T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on...

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...

Entries.DialogueText: T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad!

Entries.DialogueText: I grew up watching old sci-fi flicks, so I'm interested to see a modern take on the genre.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I grew up watching old sci-fi flicks, so I'm interested to see a modern take on the genre.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! It wasn't what I expected, but I ended up really liking it! I really identified with Wumbus. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! It wasn't what I expected, but I ended up really liking it! I really identified with Wumbus.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm usually working all the time, so it's really nice to do something like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm usually working all the , so it's really nice to do something like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Not bad! I wonder if they have any merchandise I could stock...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not bad! I wonder if they have any merchandise I could stock...

Entries.DialogueText: As a shopkeeper, I find it interesting to see how other people run their shops.
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a shopkeeper, I find it interesting to see how other people run their shops.

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* Don't tell Sandy, but my grocery selection blows hers out of the water!
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* Don't tell Sandy, but my grocery selection blows hers out of the water!

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... I'm selling eggs for cash! Hehe... Don't tell Lewis.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... I'm selling eggs for cash! Hehe... Don't tell Lewis.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to Pierre's heated shop!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to Pierre's heated shop!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to Pierre's!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to Pierre's!

Entries.DialogueText: Summer seeds available!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer seeds available!

Entries.DialogueText: Seeds for sale!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Seeds for sale!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello!

Entries.DialogueText: It's farmer {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's er {0}!

Entries.DialogueText: It's a good day to shop!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a good day to shop!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome!

Entries.DialogueText: Did you remember your wallet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you remember your wallet?
